title: Wim Crouwel Hiroshima poster
author: Useink

comments.content:
I think this is not a font. It’s custom drawn for the poster. (Have you seen the Helvetica Movie?).  
 [The Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222123905/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/) has released some of [Wim Crouwel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222123905/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Wim%20Crouwel)’s typeface designs as digital fonts, but not this one.

Similar, but obviously not the OG: [Freeman](http://web.archive.org/), [ITC Black Tulip](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222123905/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_black_tulip/), [Sinclair](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222123905/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/device_fonts/sinclair/), [House Gothic 23](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222123905/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=15&subpage=viewfonts), [Barcode](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222123905/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/barcode/?sample_text=hiroshima&sample_size=388).
Ok I see, it's a really nice one. Thanks for all the help!
